The virus invades the body and then travels through the bloodstream throughout the body, but each type of virus will choose a destination to take effect. If the virus likes to work in the blood, then we have a blood infection. When the virus finds the liver to work, we get hepatitis. When the virus comes to the intestine and begins to work, we have inflammatory bowel disease. When the virus reaches the lungs and begins to operate, we have pneumonia. Why does the virus choose an element to operate without suffusing? This is their natural instincts and we can't explain why. Probably that is up to the karma of sentient beings. Particularly the virus that causes pneumonia this time, corona, then the level of infection is fast, easy, fly through the air to land on the new body, if "luckily" to meet the mucosa then penetrate into the blood to reproduce itself then expand to the lungs to demonstrate its abilities. They quickly cause fibrosis, inflammation, paralysis of the cells of the lung follicles, causing the lungs not to exchange oxygen and carbonic with blood. There are also many viruses that cause paralysis of the cysts, but the speed is different. Particularly this strain of corona virus attacks the pulmonary cyst at a lightning speed, only a few days, the whole lung has almost been paralyzed, unable to exchange breathing anymore, the patient suffocates, struggles a little and dies. When newly infected, incubated, this person has regularly spread the virus around every day. That is why it is difficult to control the path of infection. No one is subjective, everyone has to practice inner strength to increase resistance, drink "Äá»‹a lÃ²ng" to prevent and treat viral infections, avoid direct contact with people until the disease is completely eradicated. Each person who eats wisely for health, chooses healthy foods, vegetarian foods are the safest. Wild animals often carry many harmful viruses, but their bodies are okay. When humans are exposed to a virus from a wild animal, they do not have the same resistance as a wild animal, the virus breaks out into a disease, and the pandemic. In addition, the goodness of mentality, praying for the world peace, out of disease, also helps our body increase resistance. The noble gestures of helping each other also help our body increase resistance. Collected. ST Xem thÃªm
